item.title: Help me! Real big problem!
item.dc:creator: @Zombiedevice Zombiedevice
item.description:
@Zombiedevice wrote:

Find this:

if (NpcDialogue == 1

You need to add both dialog’s for it to work. Example:

if (NpcDialogue == 11 || NpcDialogue == 12

And btw…
You have a bracket on your case 11:
[case 11: should be case 11:

Read full topic

item.title: Help me! Real big problem!
item.dc:creator: @novar2 novar2
item.description:
@novar2 wrote:

Can anyone help me with this? I try to make it where an npc talks and then my player talks and it won’t let the player talk, only the npc. Someone please help me. Here is what it looks like:

[code][case 11:

sendFrame200(4883, 591);

sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4884);

sendFrame126(“Welcome to My server”, 4885);

sendFrame126(“Click here to continue”, 4886);

sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4883);

sendFrame164(4882);

NpcDialogueSend = true;

break;

case 12:

sendFrame200(615, 974);

sendFrame126(playerName, 975);

sendFrame126(“Player talking”, 976);

sendFrame126(“Click here to continue”, 977);

sendFrame185(974);

sendFrame164(973);

NpcDialogueSend = true;

break;/code]
[/code]

Read full topic
